title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 10, ch. II, subch. I, pt. 70 - Regulated Medical Waste
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 10, ch. II, subch. I, pt. 70 - Regulated Medical Waste

State Regulations

Subpart 70-1 - Application And Definitions (§ 70-1.1 to 70-1.2)

Subpart 70-2 - Management Of Regulated Medical Waste (§ 70-2.1 to 70-2.5)

Subpart 70-3 - Requirements For Autoclaves Used To Treat Regulated Medical Waste (§ 70-3.1 to 70-3.5)

Subpart 70-4 - Requirements For Alternative Regulated Medical Waste Treatment Systems (§ 70-4.1 to 70-4.4)

Subpart 70-5 - Approval Of Alternative Treatment Technologies For Use In New York State (§ 70-5.1 to 70-5.2)

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 10, ch. II, subch. I, pt. 70

Statutory authority: Public Health Law, §§1389-b b, 1389-ff, as amd. by L. 1993, ch. 438

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
